name: auto-todo
description: A complete todo application with CRUD operations, search functionality, and robust delete handling

scripts.test: node storage-manager.test.js && node test-delete-unit-tests.js && node search.test.js && node search-integration.test.js && node theme.test.js && node keyboard-shortcuts.test.js && node keyboard-shortcut-manager.test.js && node shortcuts-config.test.js && node keyboard-handlers.test.js && node help-modal-builder.test.js && node keyboard-shortcut-refactoring.test.js && node search-focus-shortcuts.test.js && node search-focus-fix.test.js && node shortcut-utilities.test.js
scripts.test:shortcuts: node keyboard-shortcuts.test.js && node keyboard-shortcut-manager.test.js && node shortcuts-config.test.js && node keyboard-handlers.test.js && node help-modal-builder.test.js && node search-focus-shortcuts.test.js && node search-focus-fix.test.js && node keyboard-shortcut-refactoring.test.js && node shortcut-utilities.test.js

scripts.start: echo 'Open index.html in your browser to run the AutoToDo application'
